Visit Turkmenistan

I swear we're not corrupt
Some landmarks

To visit many landmarks and sights in Turkemenistan, schedule an international flight to our country's capital, Ashgabat!

Stay at one of Ashgabat's finest hotels for 1 to 2 weeks to really sight-see the city and other nearby landmarks!
